ESA.Description: The European Space Agency leads the technical development of the RACE Dashboard, in coordination with DG DEFIS.

DG DEFIS.Description: The Directorate-General for Defence Industry and Space (DG DEFIS) leads the European Commission’s activities in the European defence industry and European space sectors.

Copernicus.Description: Copernicus is the Earth observation component of the European Union’s Space programme. The great majority of RACE Indicators are based on open data from the Copernicus Programme

Network of Resources.Description: ESA NoR provides non-commercial and commercial users with a unique environment to discover European cloud services and their estimate costs for Earth Observation. Some RACE Indicators are provided as a service by NoR Providers.

Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem.Description: The Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem is an open ecosystem that provides free instant access to a wide range of data and services from the Copernicus Sentinel missions and more on our planet’s land, oceans and atmosphere.
